    • Field Detail

      • s_grammarFile

        protected static String s_grammarFile
        Location of the file containing the grammar. This path is relative to the location of the Interpreter class

      • m_parser

        protected ca.uqac.lif.bullwinkle.BnfParser m_parser
        The parser used to read expressions

      • m_nodes

        protected ca.uqac.lif.cep.interpreter.GroupStack<Object> m_nodes
        The stack used to build the object resulting from the parsing

      • s_defNb

        protected static int s_defNb
        A counter so that every user definition number is unique

      • m_lastQuery

        protected Object m_lastQuery
        The result of the last call to the interpreter. This either stores a user definition, a processor, or null if the interpretation failed.

      • m_processorDefinitions

        protected Map<String,GroupProcessor> m_processorDefinitions
        User-defined processors

      • getLastQuery

        public Object getLastQuery()
        Returns the result of the last call to the interpreter. This is either a processor, a user definition, or null if the interpreter failed, depending on the query.
        Returns:
        The result of the call
